   22: 
   23: -module(ssl_trace_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_api.hrl").
   28: 
   29: -export([suite/0,
   30:          all/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          init_per_testcase/2,
   34:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   35: 
   36: -export([tc_basic/0,
   37:          tc_basic/1,
   38:          tc_no_trace/0,
   39:          tc_no_trace/1,
   40:          tc_api_profile/0,
   41:          tc_api_profile/1,
   42:          tc_rle_profile/0,
   43:          tc_rle_profile/1,
   44:          tc_budget_option/0,
   45:          tc_budget_option/1,
   46:          tc_file_option/0,
   47:          tc_file_option/1,
   48:          tc_write/0,
   49:          tc_write/1,
   50:          tc_check_profiles/0,
   51:          tc_check_profiles/1]).
   52: -define(TRACE_FILE, "ssl_trace.txt").
   53: 
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   56: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   58:             {timetrap,{seconds,60}}].
   59: 
   60: all() -> [tc_basic, tc_no_trace, tc_api_profile, tc_rle_profile,
   61:           tc_budget_option, tc_write, tc_file_option, tc_check_profiles].
   62: 
   63: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   64:     catch crypto:stop(),
   65:     try crypto:start() of
   66: 	ok ->
   67: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   68:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config)
   69:     catch _:_ ->
   70: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   71:     end.
   72: 
   73: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   74:     ssl:stop(),
   75:     application:stop(crypto).
   76: 
   77: init_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: end_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
   81:     ssl_trace:stop(),
   82:     Config.
   83: 
   84: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   85: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   86: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   87: tc_basic() ->
   88:     [{doc, "Basic test of ssl_trace API"}].
   89: tc_basic(_Config) ->
   90:     {ok, L0} = ssl_trace:start(),
   91:     true = is_pid(whereis(ssl_trace)),
   92:     true = is_list(L0),
   93:     {ok,L0} = ssl_trace:on(),
   94:     {ok,L0} = ssl_trace:on(),
   95:     L0 = ssl_trace:is_on(),
   96:     [] = ssl_trace:is_off(),
   97: 
   98:     L1 = [hd(L0)],
   99:     L2 = tl(L0),
  100:     {ok,L1} = ssl_trace:off(L2),
  101: 
  102:     L1 = ssl_trace:is_on(),
  103:     L2 = ssl_trace:is_off(),
  104: 
  105:     {ok,[]} = ssl_trace:off(),
  106:     {ok,[]} = ssl_trace:off(),
  107: 
  108:     [] = ssl_trace:is_on(),
  109:     L0 = ssl_trace:is_off(),
  110:     ok = ssl_trace:stop(),
  111:     undefined = whereis(ssl_trace),
  112: 
  113:     {ok, EnabledProfiles} = ssl_trace:start(),
  114:     [true = lists:member(ExpectedProfile, EnabledProfiles) ||
  115:         ExpectedProfile <- [api, crt, csp, hbn, kdt, rle, ssn]],
  116:     {ok, [api]} = ssl_trace:on(api),
  117:     {ok, []} = ssl_trace:off(api),
  118:     ok = ssl_trace:stop(),
  119:     ok.
  120: 
  121: tc_no_trace() ->
  122:     [{doc, "Verify there are no traces if not enabled"}].
  123: tc_no_trace(Config) ->
  124:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(),
  125:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  126:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  127:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  128:     ExpectedTraces =
  129:         #{call => [], processed => [], exception_from => [], return_from => []},
  130:     ExpectedTraces = receive_map(Ref),
  131:     ok = ssl_trace:stop(),
  132:     ok.
  133: 
  134: tc_api_profile() ->
  135:     [{doc, "Verify traces for 'api' trace profile"}].
  136: tc_api_profile(Config) ->
  137:     On = [api, rle],
  138:     Off = [],
  139:     TracesAfterConnect =
  140:         #{
  141:           call =>
  142:               [{"    (server) -> ssl:handshake/2", ssl, handshake},
  143:                {"    (server) -> ssl_gen_statem:initial_hello/3",
  144:                 ssl_gen_statem, initial_hello},
  145:                {"    (client) -> ssl_gen_statem:initial_hello/3",
  146:                 ssl_gen_statem, initial_hello}],
  147:          return_from =>
  148:               [{"    (server) <- ssl:listen/2 returned", ssl, listen},
  149:                {"    (server) <- ssl_gen_statem:initial_hello/3 returned",
  150:                 ssl_gen_statem, initial_hello},
  151:                {"    (client) <- ssl_gen_statem:initial_hello/3 returned",
  152:                 ssl_gen_statem, initial_hello},
  153:                {"    (client) <- ssl_gen_statem:connect/8 returned",
  154:                 ssl_gen_statem, connect},
  155:                {"    (client) <- ssl:connect/3 returned", ssl, connect},
  156:                {"    (server) <- ssl:handshake/2 returned", ssl, handshake},
  157:                {"    (client) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init},
  158:                {"    (server) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init}],
  159:           processed =>
  160:               ["rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*client)",
  161:                "rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*server)",
  162:                "rle ('?') -> ssl:listen/2 (*server) Args",
  163:                "rle ('?') -> ssl:connect/3 (*client) Args",
  164:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*server)",
  165:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*client)",
  166:                "api (client) -> ssl_gen_statem:connect/8"]},
  167:     TracesAfterDisconnect =
  168:         #{
  169:           call =>
  170:               [{"    (client) -> ssl:close/1", ssl, close},
  171:                {"    (client) -> ssl:close/1", ssl, close},
  172:                {"    (client) -> ssl_gen_statem:close/2", ssl_gen_statem, close},
  173:                {"    (client) -> ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1",
  174:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert},
  175:                {"    (server) -> ssl:close/1", ssl, close},
  176:                {"    (server) -> ssl_gen_statem:close/2", ssl_gen_statem, close},
  177:                {"    (server) -> ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1",
  178:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert}],
  179:          return_from =>
  180:               [{"    (client) <- ssl:close/1 returned", ssl, close},
  181:                {"    (client) <- ssl:close/1 returned", ssl, close},
  182:                {"    (client) <- ssl_gen_statem:close/2 returned",
  183:                 ssl_gen_statem, close},
  184:                {"    (client) <- ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1 returned",
  185:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert},
  186:                {"    (server) <- ssl:close/1 returned", ssl, close},
  187:                {"    (server) <- ssl_gen_statem:close/2 returned",
  188:                 ssl_gen_statem, close},
  189:                {"    (server) <- ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1 returned",
  190:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert}],
  191:           exception_from =>
  192:               [{"    (server) exception_from ssl_gen_statem:init/1  {exit,{shutdown,normal}}",
  193:                 ssl_gen_statem, init},
  194:                {"    (client) exception_from ssl_gen_statem:init/1  {exit,{shutdown,normal}}",
  195:                 ssl_gen_statem, init}]},
  196:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(),
  197:     {ok, On} = ssl_trace:on(On),
  198:     Delta = On -- Off,
  199:     {ok, Delta} = ssl_trace:off(Off),
  200:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  201:     UnhandledTraceCnt1 =
  202:         #{call => 2, processed => 0, exception_from => no_trace_received,
  203:           return_from => 2},
  204:     check_trace_map(Ref, TracesAfterConnect, UnhandledTraceCnt1),
  205:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  206:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  207:     UnhandledTraceCnt2 =
  208:         #{call => 0, processed => no_trace_received, exception_from => 0,
  209:           return_from => 0},
  210:     check_trace_map(Ref, TracesAfterDisconnect, UnhandledTraceCnt2),
  211:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  212:     ok.
  213: 
  214: tc_rle_profile() ->
  215:     [{doc, "Verify traces for 'rle' trace profile"}].
  216: tc_rle_profile(Config) ->
  217:     On = [rle],
  218:     ExpectedTraces =
  219:         #{
  220:           call =>
  221:               [],
  222:          return_from =>
  223:               [{"    (client) <- ssl:connect/3 returned", ssl, connect},
  224:                {"    (server) <- ssl:listen/2 returned", ssl, listen},
  225:                {"    (client) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init},
  226:                {"    (server) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init}],
  227:           processed =>
  228:               ["rle ('?') -> ssl:listen/2 (*server) Args =",
  229:                "rle ('?') -> ssl:connect/3 (*client) Args",
  230:                "rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*server) Args = [[server",
  231:                "rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*client) Args = [[client",
  232:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*server)",
  233:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*client)"]},
  234:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(),
  235:     {ok, On} = ssl_trace:on(On),
  236:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  237:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  238:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  239:     UnhandledTraceCnt =
  240:         #{call => no_trace_received, processed => 0, exception_from => 2,
  241:           return_from => 0},
  242:     check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces, UnhandledTraceCnt),
  243:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  244:     ok.
  245: 
  246: tc_budget_option() ->
  247:     [{doc, "Verify that budget option limits amount of traces"}].
  248: tc_budget_option(Config) ->
  249:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), [{budget, 10}]),
  250:     {ok, [api,rle]} = ssl_trace:on([api,rle]),
  251:     ssl_trace:write("Not a trace from dbg - not included in budget", []),
  252:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  253:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  254:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  255:     CountReceived = fun(Reference) ->
  256:                             ReceiveStats = check_trace_map(Reference, #{}),
  257:                             ReceivedNumbers =
  258:                                 lists:filter(fun is_number/1,
  259:                                              maps:values(ReceiveStats)),
  260:                             lists:sum(ReceivedNumbers)
  261:                     end,
  262:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  263:     ExpectedTraceCnt = 10,
  264:     ActualTraceCnt = CountReceived(Ref),
  265:     case ExpectedTraceCnt == ActualTraceCnt of
  266:         true ->
  267:             ok;
  268:         _ ->
  269:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected ~w traces, but found ~w",
  270:                   [ExpectedTraceCnt, ActualTraceCnt])
  271:     end.
  272: 
  273: tc_file_option() ->
  274:     [{doc, "Verify that file option redirects traces to file"}].
  275: tc_file_option(Config) ->
  276:     _Ref = ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), [{budget, 10}, file]),
  277:     {ok, [api,rle]} = ssl_trace:on([api,rle]),
  278:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  279:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  280:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  281:     ActualTraceCnt = count_line(?TRACE_FILE),
  282:     ExpectedTraceCnt = 11, %% budget + 1 message about end of budget
  283:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  284:     case ExpectedTraceCnt == ActualTraceCnt of
  285:         true ->
  286:             ok;
  287:         _ ->
  288:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected ~w traces, but found ~w",
  289:                   [ExpectedTraceCnt, ActualTraceCnt])
  290:     end.
  291: 
  292: tc_write() ->
  293:     [{doc, "Verify that custom messages can be written"}].
  294: tc_write(_Config) ->
  295:     _Ref = ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), [{budget, 10}, file]),
  296:     {ok, [api,rle]} = ssl_trace:on([api,rle]),
  297:     ssl_trace:write("Custom trace message ~w", [msg]),
  298:     ActualTraceCnt = count_line(?TRACE_FILE),
  299:     ExpectedTraceCnt = 1,
  300:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  301:     case ExpectedTraceCnt == ActualTraceCnt of
  302:         true ->
  303:             ok;
  304:         _ ->
  305:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected ~w traces, but found ~w",
  306:                   [ExpectedTraceCnt, ActualTraceCnt])
  307:     end.
  308: 
  309: tc_check_profiles() ->
  310:     [{doc, "Verify that trace profile contain valid functions"}].
  311: tc_check_profiles(_Config) ->
  312:     CheckFun =
  313:         fun(Profile, Module, Fun, DefinedFunctions) ->
  314:                 case lists:member(Fun, DefinedFunctions) of
  315:                     true -> ok;
  316:                     _ ->
  317:                         {F, A} = Fun,
  318:                         ct:fail("~w:~w/~w from '~w' trace profile not found",
  319:                                 [Module, F, A, Profile])
  320:                 end
  321:         end,
  322:     CheckModule =
  323:         fun(Profile, {Module, Funs}) ->
  324:                 DefinedFunctions = Module:module_info(functions),
  325:                 [CheckFun(Profile, Module, F, DefinedFunctions) ||
  326:                     F <- Funs]
  327:         end,
  328:     CheckTProfile =
  329:         fun({Profile, _, _, ModFunsTuples}) ->
  330:                 [CheckModule(Profile, MFTuple) ||
  331:                     MFTuple <- ModFunsTuples]
  332:         end,
  333:     [CheckTProfile(P) || P <- ssl_trace:trace_profiles()],
  334:     ok.
  335: 
  336: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  337: ssl_trace_start() ->
  338:     ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), []).
  339: 
  340: ssl_trace_start(Ref, TraceOpts) ->
  341:     TestProcess = self(),
  342:     {ok, [_|_]} = ssl_trace:start(fun(Format,Args) ->
  343:                                           ct:log(Format, Args),
  344:                                           TestProcess ! {Ref, Args}
  345:                                   end,
  346:                                   TraceOpts),
  347:     Ref.
  348: 
  349: receive_map(Ref) ->
  350:     Empty = #{call => [], return_from => [], exception_from => [],
  351:               processed => []},
  352:     receive_map(Ref, Empty).
  353: 
  354: receive_map(Ref,
  355:                Map = #{call := Call, return_from := Return,
  356:                        exception_from := Exception, processed := Processed}) ->
  357:     receive
  358:         {Ref, Msg = [_, {call, {_, _, _}}, _]} ->
  359:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{call => [Msg|Call]});
  360:         {Ref, Msg = [_, {return_from, {_, _, _}, _}, _]} ->
  361:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{return_from => [Msg|Return]});
  362:         {Ref, Msg = [_, {exception_from, {_, _, _}, _}, _]} ->
  363:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{exception_from => [Msg|Exception]});
  364:         {Ref, Msg = [_Timestamp, _Pid, _ExpectString]} ->
  365:             %% processed means a trace was processed by Module:handle_trace
  366:             %% function and is not received as a trace tuple
  367:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{processed => [Msg|Processed]})
  368:     after 5000 ->
  369:             Map
  370:     end.
  371: 
  372: check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces) ->
  373:     Received = receive_map(Ref),
  374:     L = [check_key(Type, ExpectedTraces, maps:get(Type, Received)) ||
  375:             Type <- maps:keys(Received)],
  376:     maps:from_list(L).
  377: 
  378: check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces, ExpectedRemainders) ->
  379:     ActualRemainders = check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces),
  380:     case ExpectedRemainders == ActualRemainders of
  381:         true ->
  382:             ok;
  383:         _ ->
  384:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected trace remainders = ~w ~n"
  385:                  "Actual trace remainders = ~w",
  386:                  [ExpectedRemainders, ActualRemainders])
  387:     end.
  388: 
  389: check_key(Type, ExpectedTraces, ReceivedPerType) ->
  390:     ReceivedPerTypeCnt = length(ReceivedPerType),
  391:     ?CT_LOG("Received Type = ~w Messages# = ~w", [Type, ReceivedPerTypeCnt]),
  392:     case ReceivedPerTypeCnt > 0 of
  393:         true ->
  394:             ExpectedPerType = maps:get(Type, ExpectedTraces, []),
  395:             ExpectedPerTypeCnt = length(ExpectedPerType),
  396:             check_trace(Type, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType),
  397:             {Type, ReceivedPerTypeCnt - ExpectedPerTypeCnt};
  398:         _ ->
  399:             {Type, no_trace_received}
  400:     end.
  401: 
  402: -define(CHECK_TRACE(PATTERN, Expected),
  403:         fun({ExpectedString, Module, Function}) ->
  404:                 P2 = fun(Received) ->
  405:                              PATTERN = Received,
  406:                              SearchResult =
  407:                                  string:str(lists:flatten(Txt), ExpectedString),
  408:                              case {Module == M, Function == F, SearchResult > 0} of
  409:                                  {true, true, true} ->
  410:                                      true;
  411:                                  _ -> false
  412:                              end
  413:                      end,
  414:                 Result = lists:any(P2, ReceivedPerType),
  415:                 case Result of
  416:                     false ->
  417:                         F = "Trace not found: {~s, ~w, ~w}",
  418:                         ?CT_FAIL(F, [ExpectedString, Module, Function]);
  419:                     _ -> ok
  420:                 end,
  421:                 Result
  422:         end).
  423: 
  424: -define(CHECK_PROCESSED_TRACE(PATTERN, Expected),
  425:         fun(ExpectedString) ->
  426:                 P2 = fun(Received) ->
  427:                              PATTERN = Received,
  428:                              SearchResult =
  429:                                  string:str(lists:flatten(Txt), ExpectedString),
  430:                              SearchResult > 0
  431:                      end,
  432:                 Result = lists:any(P2, ReceivedPerType),
  433:                 case Result of
  434:                     false ->
  435:                         F = "Processed trace not found: ~s",
  436:                         ?CT_FAIL(F, [ExpectedString]);
  437:                     _ -> ok
  438:                 end,
  439:                 Result
  440:         end).
  441: 
  442: check_trace(call, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  443:     P1 = ?CHECK_TRACE([Txt, {call, {M, F, _Args}}, _], Expected),
  444:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  445: check_trace(return_from, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  446:     P1 = ?CHECK_TRACE([Txt, {return_from, {M, F, _Args}, _Return}, _], Expected),
  447:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  448: check_trace(exception_from, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  449:     P1 = ?CHECK_TRACE([Txt, {exception_from, {M, F, _Args}, _Return}, _], Expected),
  450:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  451: check_trace(processed, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  452:     P1 = ?CHECK_PROCESSED_TRACE([_Timestamp, _Pid, Txt], Expected),
  453:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  454: check_trace(Type, _ExpectedPerType, _ReceivedPerType) ->
  455:     ?CT_FAIL("Type = ~w not checked", [Type]),
  456:     ok.
  457: 
  458: count_line(Filename) ->
  459:     case file:open(Filename, [read]) of
  460:         {ok, IoDevice} ->
  461:             Count = count_line(IoDevice, 0),
  462:             file:close(IoDevice),
  463:             Count;
  464:         {error, Reason} ->
  465:             ?CT_PAL("~s open error  reason:~s~n", [Filename, Reason]),
  466:             ct:fail(Reason)
  467:     end.
  468: 
  469: count_line(IoDevice, Count) ->
  470:     case file:read_line(IoDevice) of
  471:         {ok, _} -> count_line(IoDevice, Count+1);
  472:         eof     -> Count
  473:     end.
  474: 
  475: ssl_connect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  476:     ?CT_LOG("Establishing connection for producing traces", []),
  477:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  478:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  479:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  480:     Server =
  481: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  482: 				   {from, self()},
  483: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  484: 				   {options,  [{keepalive, true},{active, false}
  485: 					       | ServerOpts]}]),
  486:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  487:     Client =
  488: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  489: 				   {host, Hostname},
  490: 				   {from, self()},
  491: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  492: 				   {options, [{keepalive, true},{active, false}
  493: 					      | ClientOpts]}]),
  494:     ?CT_LOG("Testcase ~p, Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [self(), Client, Server]),
  495:     [Server, Client].
